name: Monkey steals honey
description:
SHORT DESCRIPTION

Monkey steals honey is my 8th Game a Week. A 2D platform game with running gameplay developed this time not alone but with a fellow college partner.

GAME PITCH

You've stolen a bees hive plenty of honey and now they are chansing you so angry!

Escape from the bees an reach the end of the map but don't forget to get as much bananas as you can so monkey can make a delicious honey and bananas desert.

CONTROLS

Arroy keys to move monkey.

Z to jump

Esc to quit

R to restart level
